modules.zones
Class ZonesCollection

java.lang.Object
  modules.zones.ZonesCollection

public class ZonesCollection
extends java.lang.Object

Collection of zones, with the facilities to add, remove and get zones in an easy way.

Author:
Creative

Constructor Summary

          Initializes the Collection.

          Changes the zone type of the zone specified by "zonenumber", and updates the zone's information in the GUI table.

editZone

public void editZone(int zonenumber,
                     Zone.ZoneType zonetype)
Changes the zone type of the zone specified by "zonenumber", and updates the zone's information in the GUI table.

Parameters:
zonenumber - zone number of the zone to edit.
zonetype - the new type to change the zone's type to.
